system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (any)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.jd9T5TQHEmmecN8M]{Combat Martial Arts}, or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.IwqDaI7nRoxstgvB]{Exotic Melee Weapons Proficiency}

Benefits

After making a successful melee attack against an enemy in melee combat, the character gains a +3 melee attack bonus for subsequent attacks against that enemy during the current round

Special

This bonus only applies to the last enemy the character attacked successfully.
